014package org.jdbi.v3.testing.junit5;
015
016import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
017import javax.annotation.Nullable;
018import javax.sql.DataSource;
019
020import org.postgresql.ds.PGSimpleDataSource;
021
022import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
023
024public class JdbiExternalPostgresExtension extends JdbiExtension {
025
026    private final String hostname;
027    private final Integer port;
028    private final String username;
029    private final String password;
030    private final String database;
031
032    private final String jdbcUri;
033
034    /**
035     * Jdbi external PostgreSQL JUnit 5 rule. This class should not be used directly but through {@link JdbiExtension#externalPostgres(String, Integer, String, String, String)}.
036     *
037     * This class is public with a protected constructor to allow special case construction.
038     *
039     * <pre>{@code
040     *     @RegisterExtension
041     *     public JdbiExtension extension = new JdbiExternalPostgresExtension(...) {
042     *         @Override
043     *         protected DataSource createDataSource() {
044     *            ...
045     *         }
046     *     };
047     * }</pre>
048     */
049    protected JdbiExternalPostgresExtension(@Nonnull String hostname,
050        @Nullable Integer port,
051        @Nonnull String database,
052        @Nullable String username,
053        @Nullable String password) {
054
055        this.hostname = requireNonNull(hostname, "hostname is null");
056        this.port = port;
057
058        this.database = requireNonNull(database, "database is null");
059
060        this.username = username;
061        this.password = password;
062
063        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("jdbc:postgresql://");
064        sb.append(this.hostname);
065        if (port != null) {
066            sb.append(':').append(port);
067        }
068        sb.append("database");
069        if (username != null) {
070            sb.append("?user=").append(username);
071        }
072
073        this.jdbcUri = sb.toString();
074    }
075
076    static JdbiExtension instance(@Nonnull String hostname,
077        @Nullable Integer port,
078        @Nonnull String database,
079        @Nullable String username,
080        @Nullable String password) {
081        return new JdbiExternalPostgresExtension(hostname, port, database, username, password);
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public String getUrl() {
086        return jdbcUri;
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    protected DataSource createDataSource() throws Exception {
091        final PGSimpleDataSource datasource = new PGSimpleDataSource();
092
093        datasource.setServerNames(new String[]{hostname});
094
095        if (port != null) {
096            datasource.setPortNumbers(new int[]{port});
097        }
098
099        datasource.setUser(username);
100        datasource.setPassword(password);
101
102        datasource.setDatabaseName(database);
103        datasource.setApplicationName(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
104
105        return datasource;
106
107    }
108}
